segments.pli: “Yesaṃ kesañci, bhikkhave, cattāro iddhipādā viraddhā, viraddho tesaṃ ariyo maggo sammā dukkhakkhayagāmī.
segments.en: “Mendicants, whoever has missed out on the four bases of psychic power has missed out on the noble path to the complete ending of suffering.

segments.pli: Yesaṃ kesañci, bhikkhave, cattāro iddhipādā āraddhā, āraddho tesaṃ ariyo maggo sammā dukkhakkhayagāmī.
segments.en: Whoever has undertaken the four bases of psychic power has undertaken the noble path to the complete ending of suffering.

segments.pli: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu chandasamādhippadhānasaṅkhārasamannāgataṃ iddhipādaṃ bhāveti,
segments.en: It’s when a mendicant develops the basis of psychic power that has immersion due to enthusiasm …

segments.pli: Yesaṃ kesañci, bhikkhave, ime cattāro iddhipādā viraddhā, viraddho tesaṃ ariyo maggo sammā dukkhakkhayagāmī.
segments.en: Whoever has missed out on these four bases of psychic power has missed out on the noble path to the complete ending of suffering.

segments.pli: Yesaṃ kesañci, bhikkhave, ime cattāro iddhipādā āraddhā, āraddho tesaṃ ariyo maggo sammā dukkhakkhayagāmī”ti.
segments.en: Whoever has undertaken these four bases of psychic power has undertaken the noble path to the complete ending of suffering.”

sections.title: “Mendicants, whoever has missed out on the four bases…

suttaplex.blurb: One who has neglected the four bases of psychic power has neglected the path to the end of suffering.
